div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2299 Corvo, Azores, 1749 (272) Burial: 200 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 2 Av, 7 AE. Pot hoard Cyrene: 1 AE (as BMC pl. 26, 3) Carthage: 1 AV fifth-st. 1 AV tenth-st. 6 AE (including types of SNGCop. 118, 126, 164, 175, 191 ?, 310) Disposition: unknown Podolijn, Det Götheborgska Wetenskaps och Witter- hets Samhällets Handlingar, Första stycket (Götheborg, 1778), p. 106, illus. Hennig, AA 1927, pp. 11-9 Schwabacher, SM 1962, pp. 22-6, illus.; Numisma 59 (1962), pp. 9-16 Jenkins-Lewis, Carthage, p. 61, hoard XXIV Pfeiler, SM 1965, p. 53 Kricheldorf, SM 1965, p. 152
